resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104685</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104685</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085977</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hands-on biology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blindeinschub Biologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie à commande manuelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia hands-on</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia hands-on</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εμπράγματη βιολογία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Biología con manos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Hands-on science exploration clarifies difficult concepts and engages learners who have difficulty in more traditional classrooms. This article looks at an inquiry-based classroom that meets the needs of all of its students.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blindeinschub Wissenschaft Erforschung erklärt 
schwierige Konzepte und engagiert sich Anfänger, die Schwierigkeit in
den traditionelleren Klassenzimmern haben. Dieser Artikel 
betrachtet ein Anfrage-gegründetes Klassenzimmer, das die 
Bedürfnisse von allen seine Kursteilnehmer erfüllt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'exploration à commande manuelle de la science 
clarifie des concepts difficiles et engage les étudiants qui ont la 
difficulté dans des salles de classe plus traditionnelles. Cet 
article regarde une salle de classe enquête-basée qui satisfait les 
besoins de tous ses étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A exploração hands-on da ciência esclarece 
conceitos difíceis e acopla os learners que têm a dificuldade em 
umas salas de aula mais tradicionais. Este artigo olha uma sala 
de aula inquérito-baseada que se encontre com as necessidades de 
todos seus estudantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'esplorazione hands-on di scienza chiarisce i 
concetti difficili ed aggancia i principianti che hanno difficoltà in
aule più tradizionali. Questo articolo guarda un'aula 
inchiesta-basata che soddisfa le esigenze di tutti i relativi allievi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εμπράγματη εξερεύνηση επιστήμης διευκρινίζει τις 
δύσκολες έννοιες και δεσμεύει τους αρχαρίους που έχουν τη 
δυσκολία στις παραδοσιακότερες τάξεις. Αυτό το άρθρο 
εξετάζει μια έρευνα-βασισμένη στο τάξη που ικανοποιεί τις 
ανάγκες των όλων της σπουδαστών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La exploración con manos de la ciencia clarifica 
conceptos difíciles y contrata a principiantes que tienen dificultad 
en salas de clase más tradicionales. Este artículo mira una 
sala de clase pregunta-basada que resuelva las necesidades de todos 
sus estudiantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WAVERLY HARRELL
FN:WAVERLY HARRELL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085977</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104685</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
